import os
import sys
head_location = os.path.realpath(os.curdir)
end = head_location.find('adviser')
head_location = head_location[:end]
sys.path.append(head_location + "/adviser")

from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.automaton import ModifiedPushdownAutomaton

from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.statelist import StartState, AcceptState

from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.accept import AcceptStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.adviser import AdviserStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.code import CodeStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.codestring import CodeStringStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.escape import EscapeStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.message import MessageStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.python import PythonStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.pythonclosingbrace import PythonClosingBraceStateDescription
from modules.nlg.templates.parsing.parsers.messageparser.states.start import StartStateDescription



[docs]class MessageParser(ModifiedPushdownAutomaton):
    def __init__(self):
        ModifiedPushdownAutomaton.__init__(self, StartState(), [AcceptState()], [
            StartStateDescription(),
            AcceptStateDescription(),
            MessageStateDescription(),
            EscapeStateDescription(),
            CodeStateDescription(),
            AdviserStateDescription(),
            PythonStateDescription(),
            PythonClosingBraceStateDescription(),
            CodeStringStateDescription()
        ])



if __name__ == '__main__':
    automaton = MessageParser()
    automaton.parse('"{pers_pron(name.gender)} has the number {phone} \\"and\\" {{genitive_s(name.short_name, "\\"f\\n")}} office in {room}."')
    print(automaton.stack.data_stack)
